folder.description: Folder to store screenshots in. Will be created if it does not exist.

sequence.description: Sequence of webpages to visit, and optionally screenshot.

displayName.description: The display name, which forms the base of the screenshot name.

timestamp.description: Flag indicating if the screenshot filename should include a timestamp.

waitForTimeout.description: Interval in ms to wait, after navigation and before screenshotting.

waitForSelector.description: A css selector to wait for, after navigation and before screenshotting.

scrollElement.description: A css selector to a given page element that we'll scroll, rather than the body.

scrollElementHandle.description: A css selector to a given page element that houses the scroll element (e.g. iframe).

waitForNavigation.description: Waits for page navigation, after initial load and before screenshotting.

waitForUrl.description: Waits for navigation to this particular url.
